main

Class Figure

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Figure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Character, Pill, Tile

    public abstract class Figure
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class Figure.
    This class is the super class of "Character" but also of "Pill" and "Tile". It allows among other things to define the positions, sizes and colors of the elements of pacman game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Benoît Martel, Yoann Le Dréan
    See Also:
    Character, Pill, Tile

    • Constructor Detail

      • Figure

        protected Figure(int width,
                 int height,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 java.awt.Color color)
        Constructor of the Figure class. It allows to create an object with as a parameter a height, a width, a position in x and y and a color.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the figure.
        height - the height of the figure.
        x - the x position of the figure.
        y - the y position of the figure.
        color - the color of the figure.

        Parameters:

        height - the height of the figure.
        x - the x position of the figure.
        y - the y position of the figure.

      • centerImage

        protected void centerImage(int newWidth,
                           int newHeight)
        This method makes it possible to center an image (to change the positions x and y) according to its new size.
        Parameters:
        newWidth - the new width of the image.
        newHeight - the new height of the image.
